content: Auburn Regional Clinic's quarterly audit report highlights a 38% increase in claims related to vestibular schwannoma treatments among policyholders aged 25-40 in the Puget Sound region. Dr. Elaine Voss at Seattle Neurocare initiated a pilot program using gamma knife radiosurgery, with Policy #GKRS-229 requiring pre-authorization for metastatic cases. Patient ID N7742 underwent treatment on 03/15/2023 with notable balance improvement documented at 6-week follow-up.
